reset.title: Reset Data
reset.body: This will permanently wipe all your data. Are you sure?

credits.title: Credits
credits.body: Most assets belong to Mihoyo and were taken from in Honkai Star Rail and edited. <1/> Some icons provided by: <3> <1> <0> Reset icons created by inkubators - Flaticon </0> </1> <1> <0> Cinema icons created by SumberRejeki - Flaticon </0> </1> <1> <0> Country icons created by Freepik - Flaticon </0> </1> </3>

beg.title: Departure Warp
beg.text: 20% off for set of 10 Warps, and a <1>5</1>-star character is guaranteed within <1>50</1> Warps.
